attributes.action: Give all Final and penultimate year university students a pass
attributes.additional_details:
It is a complete injustice that medical students get a free ball and no other courses were given this benefit of doubt! Especially since in the medical domain it is of the highest importance that the people being given the authority over the lives of a nation need to be proven to be qualified. 

I ask you to think of how you would have felt if this had happened during your Final or penultimate year at university and the impact this would have had on your future career and social prospects!
attributes.background: students have not been give a voice during this pandemic with being locked into rents, subpar online classes provided by extremely under equipped universities and missing out on the full university experience. This needs to be addressed, with students being given some benefit of the doubt!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for universities.
